## Describe the issue
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## To reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior. Please include relevant source code.

## Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Hardware version
If you're booting into SuperBASIC, please provide the hardware version string shown on the initial boot screen (e.g. `14000101 A0/1x`). Otherwise, please manually describe your machine configuration:
 - Machine type: [e.g. Wildbits/Jr, Wildbits/K, Wildbits/Jr2, Wildbits/K2]
 - PCB revision: [e.g. black board, purple board]
 - CPU: [e.g. 65816, 6809]
 - Speed: [e.g. 1x, 2x]

## Screenshots / Additional context
If applicable, add screenshots or any other context to help explain your problem.
